# DopaBrain

> Free online games, quizzes, psychological tests, and utility tools. No installation required.

DopaBrain (dopabrain.com) provides 24+ free browser-based interactive content including casual games, personality tests, compatibility quizzes, and calculators.

## Games
- [Emoji Merge](https://dopabrain.com/emoji-merge/): 2048-style emoji evolution puzzle game
- [Stack Tower](https://dopabrain.com/stack-tower/): Timing-based block stacking arcade game
- [Sky Runner](https://dopabrain.com/sky-runner/): Endless space runner arcade game
- [Zigzag Runner](https://dopabrain.com/zigzag-runner/): Direction-change arcade game
- [Dungeon Clicker](https://dopabrain.com/idle-clicker/): Idle RPG dungeon clicker game

## Personality & Compatibility Tests
- [Valentine Compatibility Test](https://dopabrain.com/valentine/): Name stroke + zodiac + love type compatibility analysis
- [MBTI Love Compatibility](https://dopabrain.com/mbti-love/): MBTI-based romantic compatibility test
- [Love Frequency Test](https://dopabrain.com/love-frequency/): Discover your love frequency in Hz
- [Emotion Temperature Test](https://dopabrain.com/emotion-temp/): Measure your emotional temperature
- [HSP Sensitivity Test](https://dopabrain.com/hsp-test/): Highly Sensitive Person self-diagnosis
- [K-POP Position Test](https://dopabrain.com/kpop-position/): Find your K-POP idol position
- [Past Life Job Test](https://dopabrain.com/past-life/): Discover your past life occupation

## Quizzes
- [General Knowledge Quiz](https://dopabrain.com/quiz-app/): 100 adult-level trivia questions
- [Developer Quiz](https://dopabrain.com/dev-quiz/): IT and coding knowledge quiz

## Utility Tools
- [Dream Fortune](https://dopabrain.com/dream-fortune/): AI dream interpretation and daily fortune
- [Lottery Generator](https://dopabrain.com/lottery/): Korean Lotto number generator with analysis
- [D-Day Counter](https://dopabrain.com/dday-counter/): Event countdown tracker
- [Tax Refund Calculator](https://dopabrain.com/tax-refund-preview/): Korean year-end tax refund simulator
- [Unit Converter](https://dopabrain.com/unit-converter/): Area, weight, temperature, volume converter
- [Shopping Calculator](https://dopabrain.com/shopping-calc/): Global shopping with exchange rate and customs
- [Digital Detox Timer](https://dopabrain.com/detox-timer/): Smartphone usage timer
- [Daily Affirmation](https://dopabrain.com/affirmation/): Positive affirmation cards
- [MBTI Tips](https://dopabrain.com/mbti-tips/): MBTI personality type guide
- [White Noise Player](https://dopabrain.com/white-noise/): Ambient sounds for focus and sleep

## Blog (Korean)
- [Valentine Compatibility Guide](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/valentine-compatibility-guide.html)
- [Lunar New Year Fortune 2026](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/lunar-new-year-fortune.html)
- [Tax Refund Guide](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/tax-refund-guide.html)
- [MBTI Compatibility Guide](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/mbti-compatibility.html)
- [Lotto Strategy Guide](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/lotto-strategy.html)
- [HSP Guide](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/hsp-guide.html)
- [Pyeongsu Calculator](https://dopabrain.com/portal/blog/pyeongsu-calculator.html)
